title: Wood Type Impressions, Vol. 1 & Vol. 2
content:
Can anyone help me find a UK supplier of Wood Type Impressions, Vol. 1 or Vol. 2 by 'Without Walls'. I'm reluctant to pay huge shipping cost from USA. It is a DVD full of really nice grayscale tiffs of nice wood type letters.

We're currently working on a project that requires some genuine looking wood type. Trying to recreate o wood type effect using photoshop just doesn't do it!

Or if anyone could suggest an alternative I'd be grateful!
author: TandemStudio

comments.content:
"Or if anyone could suggest an alternative I’d be grateful!"

Talk to a local printer to create some proofs for you. It might be quite viable price wise, plus it's the real thing.
